briefdescription.para: Interface function used to change the state scalar type of the output of a state function.

detaileddescription.para:
Interface function used to change the state scalar type of the output of a state function
originalStateFunction
State function with original scalar type
currentTime
Time at which state function is to be evaluated.
State from originalStateFunction at currentTime, cast to NewStateScalarType.

memberdef.argsstring: (std::shared_ptr< Ephemeris > bodyEphemeris, std::shared_ptr< RotationalEphemeris > bodyRotationModel, std::function< Eigen::Vector6d(const double &) > referencePointRelativeStateFunction)
memberdef.name: createReferencePointEphemeris

briefdescription.para: Function to create the state function of a reference point.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to create the state function of a reference point, for instance the state of a ground station in a barycentric frame.
bodyEphemeris
Global ephemeris of body on which reference point is located
bodyRotationModel
Rotation model between global and body-fixed frame
referencePointRelativeStateFunction
Function returning the body-fixed state of the reference point as a function of time
Ephemeris describbing the state of the local reference point in the global frame (expressed global frame's coordinates, i.e. same as bodyEphemeris).

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::function< Eigen::Vector6d(const double) > stateFunction, const std::function< Eigen::Vector6d(const double) > centralBodyStateFunction, const double time)
memberdef.name: getDifferenceBetweenStates

briefdescription.para: Get relative state from body state function and central body state function.

detaileddescription.para:
Get relative state from body state function and central body state function
stateFunction
Function retrieving state of body
centralBodyStateFunction
Function retrieving state of central body (in same frame as stateFunction)
time
Time at which state functions are to be evaluated
Relative state of body w.r.t. central body at requested time.

memberdef.argsstring: (Eigen::Vector6d &relativeState, const std::function< Eigen::Vector6d() > stateFunctionOfBody, const std::function< Eigen::Vector6d() > stateFunctionOfCentralBody)
memberdef.name: getRelativeState

briefdescription.para: Function to compute the relative state from two state functions.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to compute the relative state from two state functions.
relativeState
Relative state returned by stateFunctionOfBody w.r.t. state returned by stateFunctionOfCentralBody (returned by reference).
stateFunctionOfBody
Function returning state of body for which relative state is to be computed.
stateFunctionOfCentralBody
Function returning state of central body w.r.t. which the relative state is to be computed.

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &frame)
memberdef.name: isFrameInertial

briefdescription.para: Function to determine if a given frame is an inertial frame.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to determine if a given frame is an inertial frame. Currently a frame identified as "SSB" (solar system barycenter), "inertial" or "" (empty) is recognized as inertial.
frame
Name of frame for which it is to be determined whether it is inertial.
True if inertial, false if not.

briefdescription.para: Function to return base frame.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to return base frame, i.e. in which the states of the bodies are defined during the integration.
Base frame for simulations.

memberdef.type: std::map< std::string, std::function< Eigen::Matrix< StateScalarType, 6, 1 > const TimeType) > >
memberdef.definition: std::map< std::string, std::function< Eigen::Matrix< StateScalarType, 6, 1 > const TimeType ) > > tudat::ephemerides::getTranslationFunctionsFromIntegrationFrameToEphemerisFrame
memberdef.argsstring: (const std::vector< std::string > &centralBodies, const std::vector< std::string > &bodiesToIntegrate, const std::shared_ptr< ephemerides::ReferenceFrameManager > frameManager)
memberdef.name: getTranslationFunctionsFromIntegrationFrameToEphemerisFrame

briefdescription.para: Function to get a list of translation functions from integration frames to ephemeris frames.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to get a list of translation functions from integration frames to ephemeris frames. The output functions provide the state of the ephemeris origin in the integration origin.
centralBodies
List of integration origins.
bodiesToIntegrate
List of bodies for which the origins are considered.
frameManager
Object to retrieve translations between origins
List of translation functions from integration frames to ephemeris frames.

memberdef.argsstring: (const Eigen::Matrix3d &rotationToTargetFrame, const Eigen::Matrix3d &rotationMatrixToGlobalFrameDerivative)
memberdef.name: getRotationalVelocityVectorInBaseFrameFromMatrices

briefdescription.para: Function to calculate the rotational velocity vector of frame B w.r.t frame A.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to calculate the rotational velocity vector of frame B (local) w.r.t frame A (global) from the rotation matrix between the frames, as well as its time derivative.
rotationToTargetFrame
Rotation matrix from frame A to frame B.
rotationMatrixToGlobalFrameDerivative
Time derivative if rotation matrix from frame B to frame A.
Angular velocity vector of frame B, expressed in frame A.

memberdef.argsstring: (const Eigen::Matrix3d &rotationToTargetFrame, const Eigen::Vector3d &rotationalVelocityVectorInTargetFrame)
memberdef.name: getDerivativeOfRotationMatrixToFrame

briefdescription.para: Function to calculate the time derivative of rotation matrix from frame A to frame B.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to calculate the time derivative of rotation matrix from frame A (global) to frame B (local) from the rotation matrix between the frames, as well as the angular velocity vector of frame B w.r.t. frame A.
rotationToTargetFrame
Rotation matrix from frame A to frame B.
rotationalVelocityVectorInTargetFrame
Angular velocity vector of frame B, expressed in frame A.
Time derivative if rotation matrix from frame A to frame B.

memberdef.argsstring: (const Eigen::Matrix< StateScalarType, 6, 1 > &stateInBaseFrame, const Eigen::Quaterniond &rotationToFrame, const Eigen::Matrix3d &rotationMatrixToFrameDerivative)
memberdef.name: transformStateToFrameFromRotations

briefdescription.para: Transform a state (Cartesian position and velocity) from one frame to another.

detaileddescription.para:
Transform a state (Cartesian position and velocity) from one frame to another, taking into account both the instantaneous rotational state of the two frames, and the rotational rate of one frame w.r.t. the other.
stateInBaseFrame
State that is to be transformed from base to target frame.
rotationToFrame
Rotation from base to target frame.
rotationMatrixToFrameDerivative
Time derivative of rotation matrix from base to target frame.
State (Cartesian position and velocity) in target frame.

memberdef.argsstring: (const Eigen::Matrix< StateScalarType, 6, 1 > &stateInBaseFrame, const std::function< Eigen::Quaterniond() > rotationToFrameFunction, const std::function< Eigen::Matrix3d() > rotationMatrixToFrameDerivativeFunction)
memberdef.name: transformStateToFrameFromRotationFunctions

briefdescription.para: Transform a state (Cartesian position and velocity) from one frame to another.

detaileddescription.para:
Transform a state (Cartesian position and velocity) from one frame to another, taking into account both the instantaneous rotational state of the two frames, and the rotational rate of one frame w.r.t. the other.
stateInBaseFrame
State that is to be transformed from base to target frame.
rotationToFrameFunction
Function returning rotation from base to target frame.
rotationMatrixToFrameDerivativeFunction
Function returning time derivative of rotation matrix from base to target frame.
State (Cartesian position and velocity) in target frame.

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::function< Eigen::Matrix< StateScalarType, 6, 1 >() > stateInBaseFrame, const std::function< Eigen::Matrix< StateScalarType, 6, 1 >() > centralBodyStateInBaseFrame, const std::function< Eigen::Quaterniond() > rotationToFrameFunction, const std::function< Eigen::Matrix3d() > rotationMatrixToFrameDerivativeFunction)
memberdef.name: transformRelativeStateToFrame

briefdescription.para: Transform a relative state (Cartesian position and velocity) from one frame to another.

detaileddescription.para:
Transform a relative state (Cartesian position and velocity) from one frame to another, taking into account both the instantaneous rotational state of the two frames, and the rotational rate of one frame w.r.t. the other.
stateInBaseFrame
State that is to be transformed from base to target frame.
centralBodyStateInBaseFrame
State of central body w.r.t. which returned state is to be computed. State returned by this function must be in frame with same orientation as that returned by stateInBaseFrame.
rotationToFrameFunction
Function returning rotation from base to target frame.
rotationMatrixToFrameDerivativeFunction
Function returning time derivative of rotation matrix from base to target frame.
State (Cartesian position and velocity) in target frame.

memberdef.argsstring: (const Eigen::Matrix< StateScalarType, 6, 1 > &stateInBaseFrame, const double currentTime, const std::function< Eigen::Quaterniond(const TimeType) > rotationToFrameFunction, const std::function< Eigen::Matrix3d(const TimeType) > rotationMatrixToFrameDerivativeFunction)
memberdef.name: transformStateToFrameFromRotationTimeFunctions

briefdescription.para: Transform a state (Cartesian position and velocity) from one frame to another.

detaileddescription.para:
Transform a state (Cartesian position and velocity) from one frame to another, taking into account both the instantaneous rotational state of the two frames, and the rotational rate of one frame w.r.t. the other.
stateInBaseFrame
State that is to be transformed from base to target frame.
currentTime
Input time for rotationToFrameFunction and rotationMatrixToFrameDerivativeFunction
rotationToFrameFunction
Function returning rotation from base to target frame.
rotationMatrixToFrameDerivativeFunction
Function returning time derivative of rotation matrix from base to target frame.
State (Cartesian position and velocity) in target frame.

memberdef.name: transformStateToInertialOrientation

briefdescription.para: Function to transform a state from the target to base frame of a rotational ephemeris.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to transform a state from the target (body-fixed) to base (inertial) frame of a rotational ephemeris
stateInLocalFrame
State in body-fixed frame (target frame of rotational ephemeris)
currentTime
Time at which rotational ephemeris is to be evaluated
rotationalEphemeris
Rotational ephemeris object to compute the rotation.
stateInLocalFrame State in inertial frame (base frame of rotational ephemeris)

memberdef.name: transformStateToTargetFrame

briefdescription.para: Function to transform a state from the base to target frame of a rotational ephemeris.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to transform a state from the base (inertial) to target (body-fixed) frame of a rotational ephemeris
stateInGlobalFrame
State in inertial frame (base frame of rotational ephemeris)
currentTime
Time at which rotational ephemeris is to be evaluated
rotationalEphemeris
Rotational ephemeris object to compute the rotation.
State in body-fixed frame (target frame of rotational ephemeris)

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::shared_ptr< Ephemeris > ephemeris)
memberdef.name: isTabulatedEphemeris

briefdescription.para: Function to check whether an ephemeris is a (type of) tabulated ephemeris.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to check whether an ephemeris is a (type of) tabulated ephemeris, it checks all typical combinations of class template arguments are returns true if a dynamic cast is succesful
ephemeris
Ephemeris pointer for which it is to be checked whether it is a tabulated ephemeris
True if ephemeris is a tabulated ephemeris

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::shared_ptr< Ephemeris > ephemeris)
memberdef.name: getTabulatedEphemerisSafeInterval

briefdescription.para: Function that retrieves the time interval at which a tabulated ephemeris can be safely interrogated.

detaileddescription.para:
Function that retrieves the time interval at which a tabulated ephemeris can be safely interrogated. The interval on which the interpolator inside this object is valid is checked and returned
ephemeris
Ephemeris model for which the interval is to be determined. AN exception is thrown if this is not a tabulated ephemeris
The time interval at which the tabulated ephemeris can be safely interrogated

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string referenceFrameOrigin="SSB", const std::string referenceFrameOrientation="ECLIPJ2000")
memberdef.name: createEmptyTabulatedEphemeris

briefdescription.para: Function to create an empty (dummy) tabulated ephemeris.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to create an empty (dummy) tabulated ephemeris. This is used when for instance propagating a body for which the propagated result shopuld be saved in the epehemris, but no a priori ephemeris is available
referenceFrameOrigin
Origin of reference frame in which state is defined.
referenceFrameOrientation
Orientation of reference frame in which state is defined.
Empty tabulated ephemeris with given reference frame settings

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::shared_ptr< Ephemeris > ephemerisToInterrogate, const TimeType startTime, const TimeType endTime, const TimeType timeStep, const std::shared_ptr< interpolators::InterpolatorSettings > interpolatorSettings=std::make_shared< interpolators::LagrangeInterpolatorSettings >(8))
memberdef.name: getTabulatedEphemeris

briefdescription.para: Create a tabulated ephemeris from a given ephemeris model and interpolation settings.

detaileddescription.para:
Create a tabulated ephemeris from a given ephemeris model and interpolation settings
ephemerisToInterrogate
Ephemeris model from which the tabulated model is tpo be synthesized
startTime
Start time for tabulated ephemeris
endTime
End time for tabulated ephemeris
timeStep
Constant time step for tabulated ephemeris
interpolatorSettings
Interpolation settings for tabulated ephemeris
Tabulated ephemeris, as synthesized from a given ephemeris model and interpolation settings

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::shared_ptr< RotationalEphemeris > ephemerisToInterrogate, const TimeType startTime, const TimeType endTime, const TimeType timeStep, const std::shared_ptr< interpolators::InterpolatorSettings > interpolatorSettings=std::make_shared< interpolators::LagrangeInterpolatorSettings >(8))
memberdef.name: getTabulatedRotationalEphemeris

briefdescription.para: Create a tabulated rotation model from a given rotation model and interpolation settings.

detaileddescription.para:
Create a tabulated rotation model from a given rotation model and interpolation settings
ephemerisToInterrogate
Rotation model from which the tabulated model is tpo be synthesized
startTime
Start time for tabulated model
endTime
End time for tabulated model
timeStep
Constant time step for tabulated model
interpolatorSettings

Tabulated rotation model, as synthesized from a given rotation model and interpolation settings
